name: Clown Clan Diablo
desc:
2 monsters with the same Attribute but different Types
If your Tribute Summoned monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of "Clown Clan Diablo" once per turn);
● Return all Fusion Monsters on the field and in the GYs to the Extra Deck.
● Set 1 "Clown Clan" Trap from your Deck.
